spec.name: Trianon Building
spec.description: The Trianon Building (Immeuble Trianon) is a historical residential and commercial structure completed in 1935. It was designed by architect **Marcel Desmet**, known for his Modernist and Art Deco contributions to Casablanca. The building's architecture is typical of the multi-story apartment and retail blocks of the mid-1930s, reflecting the continued, refined urban development of the city center.

access.comment: Building is inhabited; exterior view is public, interior access is restricted to residents/tenants.
